titleStmt.title: A solemn exhortation made and published to the several churches of Christ within this province of Lancaster, for the excitation of all persons therein to the practise of their duties, requisite to the effectual carrying on of church-discipline; and in it the edification of our churches, and the reformation of religion. / By the provincial synod assembled at Preston, Feb. 7. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Luke Fawne, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard
